title.rendered: How can you manage the side effects of medications?

content.rendered:
I take a lot of medications and was wondering if there was something you can take before, during or after taking the medications?

Many medications can have side effects. Since you have not specified what exactly you take, we are unable to give you specific feedback. However, here is a tool on our website where you can input the name of your medication and our system will tell you what symptoms you are likely to face and what you can do about them

As a general rule, since you are on a lot of medicines, you need to ensure you get your essential vitamins and minerals through food or through dietary supplements since medicines can deplete vital nutrients from the body.
